title: Classic Cheeseburger
description: A juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and special sauce on a toasted bun.

title: Margherita Pizza
description: A classic Italian pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil.

title: Salmon Sushi Roll
description: Fresh salmon slices wrapped in rice and seaweed, served with soy sauce and wasabi.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Pasta tossed with creamy sauce, pancetta, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper.

title: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.
